translations.translation: Do you think he is rightly guided
Have you thought, if he had been on guidance
Did you consider: what if he is on the Right Way,
What will happen if the praying person is rightly guided
What is your opinion – if he were upon guidance,
Have you seen if he is on the guidance
Have you considered if he were on the right way,
What thinkest thou? If he were upon guidance
Hast thou seen if he relieth on the guidance (of Allah)
Do you think he is rightly guided,
Bethinkest thou, if he is himself guided,
tell me, should he be on [true] guidance,
Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-
Tell me, if he (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) is on the guidance (of Allah)?
Have you seen if he was upon guidance
Do you think he is upon guidance?
Have you seen if he is upon guidance
[96:11] Have you considered what if he, the one forbidden, should be upon [a path of] guidance,
(Hast thou seen if he (relieth) on the guidance (of Allah)) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) is following the guidance: prophethood and Islam

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ خاطب سبحانه هذا الطاغي الناهي خطاب تهديد وتقريع: { أَرَأَيْتَ } أي: أخبرني أيها المفسد المتناهي في البغي والعناد { إِن كَانَ } العبد المصلي { عَلَىٰ ٱلْهُدَىٰ } [العلق: 11] والرشاد
